channel.title: Adding timers? Rep++ for answer!
channel.description:
How do I add a timer on the ::mute command or the ::jail command so it only mute and/or jails the player for 60 minutes?
Rep++ for help.
Thanks,

item.title: Adding timers? Rep++ for answer!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:6, topic:413186”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=514657.msg3736310#msg3736310 date=1314994754]
rep++ please if this help please please please.
int minutes = 60;//in minutes.
if(SYTSem.current.TimEmyllis() * 1000 * 60 * mintues) {
//do your shit here.
}

This is for Java… don’t matter what source you got.

[/quote]
gives an error… cannot find simbol??? i think my compiler broke.

Edit: No, I’m not that retarded.[/quote]
Just had to do it…

item.title: Adding timers? Rep++ for answer!
item.dc:creator: @Native1 Native^
item.description:
@Native1 wrote:

Delta has no Event Manager, but use this
http://download.oracle.com/javase/1.4.2/docs/api/javax/swing/Timer.html

item.title: Adding timers? Rep++ for answer!
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

[quote=“Native^, post:2, topic:413186”]With System.currenTimeMillis();

Or with an Event manager. Depends on your source.[/quote]

I’m using DELTA source.

Read full topic
